pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mixture Models: Parametric, Semiparametric, and Robust // Various functions are provided to estimate parametric mixture models (with Gaussian, t, Laplace, log-concave distributions, etc.) and non-parametric mixture models. The package performs hypothesis tests and addresses label switching issues in mixture models. The package also allows for parameter estimation in mixture of regressions, proportion-varying mixture of regressions, and robust mixture of regressions.
